author: Ubisoft
description:
Eren, Mikasa, and Levi join Brawlhalla! Along with them comes a Titan KO Effect, the Shiganshina District Map, & more.

Play with everyone everywhere for free: https://www.brawlhalla.com/play


! Follow Brawlhalla EVERYWHERE !
https://twitter.com/brawlhalla
https://discord.com/invite/brawlhalla
https://www.tiktok.com/@brawlhalla
https://www.twitch.tv/brawlhalla
https://www.youtube.com/Brawlhalla
https://www.instagram.com/brawlhalla/
https://www.facebook.com/Brawlhalla/

About Brawlhalla:
Brawlhalla is a 2D platform fighter and Free-to-Play on PC, Mac, PS5, PS4, Xbox Series X, Xbox One, Nintendo Switch and Mobile devices.

It offers intense, competitive online play and engaging offline modes to allow players to fully customize their fight experience. The game has a thriving esports scene and is regularly updated. Each Legend in Brawlhalla has an exciting backstory and uses a unique weapon combination and signature attacks to defeat their fellow contenders. 

Join the fight now!

#Ubiso
title: Brawlhalla x Attack on Titan Crossover Event Launch Trailer

author: Ubisoft
description:
The free third person update is out now!
Time to discover the Western Frontier from a new perspective, and to challenge yourself with the New Game +.
title: Avatar Frontiers of Pandora - Third person update
